alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 15 at 9:42PM MST until October 16 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 300 AM MST. * At 942 PM MST, stream gauge reports Waterman Wash has risen nearly 6 feet. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. The wash is expected to continue to rise several more feet through at least midnight. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Goodyear and Rainbow Valley. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
